meta.name: description
meta.content: Merced River School District serves K-8th grade students and is located in Winton, CA.

Media Release- Free and Reduced Elegibility
Parent Notice of Rights and Responsibilities 2019-2020
Aviso a Los Padres de Sus Derechos y Responsabilidades 2019-2020

div.style: position: absolute; overflow: hidden; left: 0px; top: 0px; width: 1600px; height: 400px;

div.div:

Concerns or Feedback?
Please click the above link to take a short survey on what we can do to provide your student with the best, or just to let us know your thoughts on a topic.
Vision The Merced River School District will educate our students to be successful, literate, contributing members to society.
Mission The Merced River School District will develop STARS by equipping students with the tools to be Safe, Trustworthy, Accountable, Respectful and Successful citizens. This will be accomplished by providing high-quality instruction and building meaningful relationships in a positive school-wide environment.

article.div: We will update you on any changes. Please continue to take precautionary measures to prevent the spread of the COVID19 virus. Tendremos actualizados sobre cambios. SIga tomando precauciones para evitar el COVID.

h1.a: WELCOME BACK, Back to School Night & Book Fair!!!

article.div: We are 1 day away from the 2019-2020 School Year! Please see the attached flyer. Our B2S Night is this Thursday, Aug. 15 from 6:00- 7:30. Click Read Full Story for more info.
